instruction: Assess the fitness of my profile for the job.
input:
Profile: I am a computer science student with two years of experience working in software development. I have a good knowledge of programming languages and have experience working with databases. I am also very motivated and have a positive attitude.
Job: software engineer.
output: Your profile is highly suitable for the role of software engineer. You have the technical expertise and experience necessary for the job, and your strong motivation and positive attitude will serve you well. You should also have the necessary skills to thrive in the role and be successful.
